roleset.name: to stare at
roleset.note: OGLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'ogle' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from ogle.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: He is ogling the curtains rippling above the ventilation ducts .
example.arg: the curtains rippling above the ventilation ducts
